original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1211)@</color>以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(1356)@</color> <color=#13ccd7>智力</color>對自身範圍內敵方造成法術傷害，並在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4855)@</color> 秒內使全體我方武將反射所有傷害，且有 <color=#ccffcc>9%</color> 的機率以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(1356)@</color> <color=#13ccd7>智力</color>對範圍內敵方造成法術傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1211)@</color> to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(1356)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color> inflicts spell damage on enemies within its own range, and causes all our generals to reflect all the damage within <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4855)@</color> seconds, and there is The probability of <color=#ccffcc>9%</color> is <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(1356)@</color> <color=#13ccd7>Int</color> to cause spell damage to enemies within the range .
